pkgmetadata.longdescription: Complete Change Point Analysis // Provides a comprehensive approach for identifying and estimating change points in multivariate time series through various statistical methods. Implements the multiple change point detection methodology from Ryan Killick (2023) doi:10.1080/00401706.2023.2183261 and a novel estimation methodology from Fotopoulos et al. (2023) doi:10.1007/s00362-023-01495-0 generalized to fit the detection methodologies. Performs both detection and estimation of change points, providing visualization and summary information of the estimation process for each detected change point.
